user.title: Configure Service Result
user.description:
Configure a sensor that exposes the response from a Home Assistant service call.

Select a service from the dropdown, or paste YAML directly from Developer Tools â†’ Services.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this sensor (e.g., 'Tibber Prices')
data_description.service_action: Select the service/action to call. If you paste full YAML below, this will be auto-detected.
data_description.service_data_yaml: Optional service data. You can paste the full YAML from Developer Tools - redundant parts (action, entry_id) will be cleaned automatically.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Service Result
reconfigure.description: Update the service configuration for this sensor.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this sensor
data_description.service_data_yaml: Optional service data. You can paste the full YAML from Developer Tools.

error.service_not_found: Service not found. Verify the selected action exists.
error.yaml_parse_error: Invalid YAML syntax. Please check the service data.
error.yaml_not_dict: Service data must be a YAML dictionary (key: value pairs).
error.no_service_selected: Please select a service action from the dropdown or provide it in the YAML.
error.service_call_failed: Failed to call the service. Please verify the service works in Developer Tools first.

init.title: Configure Options
init.description: Adjust the polling interval. To change the service configuration, use Reconfigure instead.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to call the service (in seconds). Minimum 10 seconds.

yaml_parse_error.message: Failed to parse service data YAML.

service_not_found.message: The configured service was not found.

service_call_failed.message: Failed to call the configured service.
